column5: A spacious and well decorated private suite and bath in Montrose. Feels like having your own apartment as guests have a private entry and key to their part of the home! Comfy bed and bedding.  This Mediterranean townhouse is very well located, close to all Houston has to offer for both business or pleasure!   FREE PARKING in the street. Large yard with patio furniture to enjoy the Texas weather!
column8: Montrose suite w.private entrance CLOSE TO IT ALL!
